dropdownBasicCode:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'nz-demo-dropdown-basic', template: ` Hover me
  • 1st menu item
  • 2nd menu item
  • 3rd menu item
 ` }) export class NzDemoDropdownBasicComponent {}
dropdownOtherElementsCode:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'nz-demo-dropdown-item', template: ` Hover me
  • 1st menu item
  • 2nd menu item
  • 3rd menu item（disabled）
 ` }) export class NzDemoDropdownItemComponent {}
dropdownCascadingCode:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'nz-demo-dropdown-sub-menu', template: ` Cascading menu
  • 1st menu item
  • 2nd menu item
    • 3rd menu item
    • 4th menu item
    • 3rd menu item
    • 4th menu item
 ` }) export class NzDemoDropdownSubMenuComponent { change(value: boolean): void { console.log(value); } }
dropdownTriggerCode:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'nz-demo-dropdown-trigger', template: ` Click me
  • 1st menu item
  • 2nd menu item
  • disabled menu item
    • 3rd menu item
    • 4th menu item
    • 3rd menu item
    • 4th menu item
 ` }) export class NzDemoDropdownTriggerComponent {}
dropdownButtonCode:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'nz-demo-dropdown-dropdown-button', template: `
  • menu1 1st menu item
  • menu1 2nd menu item
  • menu1 3rd menu item
  • menu2 1st menu item
  • menu2 2nd menu item
  • menu2 3rd menu item
  • menu3 1st menu item
  • menu3 2nd menu item
  • menu3 3rd menu item
  • menu4 1st menu item
  • menu4 2nd menu item
  • menu4 3rd menu item
 `, styles: [ ` nz-button-group { margin-right: 8px; } ` ] }) export class NzDemoDropdownDropdownButtonComponent { log(): void { console.log('click dropdown button'); } }
dropdownAPICode:
Hover me
  • 1st menu item
